DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate long-term safety tolerability GK Activator ( 2 ) dose range 25mg - 100mg po bid , administer alone combination metformin , patient type 2 diabetes . Eligible patient complete study BM18248 ( GK Activator ( 2 ) monotherapy ) BM18249 ( GK Activator ( 2 ) metformin ) ; continue treatment regimen ( mono combination therapy ) receive initial study . The anticipated time study treatment 3-12 month , target sample size 100-500 individual .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Long-Term Safety Tolerability GK Activator ( 2 ) Patients With Type 2 Diabetes .
DOC.criteria: type 2 diabetic patient complete study BM18248 BM18249 ; patient consider investigator suitable long term treatment GK Activator ( 2 ) . type 1 diabetes mellitus ; woman pregnant , breastfeed use adequate contraceptive method .
